statements: SELECT * FROM RealEstateEscrowTransactions;
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_name, seller_name, transaction_date FROM RealEstateEscrowTransactions WHERE escrow_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, property_address, escrow_amount FROM RealEstateEscrowTransactions WHERE seller_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT buyer_name, property_address FROM RealEstateEscrowTransactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM RealEstateEscrowTransactions WHERE encrypted_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM RealEstateEscrowTransactions WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_date, escrow_amount FROM RealEstateEscrowTransactions WHERE seller_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT buyer_name, property_address FROM RealEstateEscrowTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RealEstateEscrowTransactions WHERE escrow_amount > 100000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, seller_name, buyer_name, property_address FROM RealEstateEscrowTransactions WHERE buyer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_agents;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM real_estate_agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT agent_id, name, email FROM real_estate_agents ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE escrow_status = 'pending';
SELECT transaction_id, property_id, buyer_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_agents WHERE agent_id = 1
SELECT name, phone_number FROM real_estate_agents WHERE name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT agent_id, name, email FROM real_estate_agents ORDER BY agent_id DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE escrow_status = 'pending' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT seller_id, buyer_id, property_id FROM transactions WHERE escrow_amount > 10000
SELECT * FROM escrow_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, property_address, transaction_amount FROM escrow_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 10000;
SELECT seller_name, buyer_name FROM escrow_transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM escrow_accounts ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_id, created_date FROM escrow_accounts WHERE account_holder_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM escrow_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 10000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_name, seller_name FROM escrow_transactions WHERE property_address LIKE '%Main Street%'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM escrow_transactions WHERE seller_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT transaction_id, seller_name, transaction_date FROM escrow_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM escrow_accounts WHERE created_date < '2022-05-30' ORDER BY created_date
SELECT * FROM Escrow_Accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT amount, property_address FROM Escrow_Accounts WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_holder_name, transaction_date FROM Escrow_Accounts WHERE property_address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM Escrow_Accounts;
SELECT account_holder_name, amount FROM Escrow_Accounts WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT account_id, property_address FROM Escrow_Accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount), MIN(amount) FROM Escrow_Accounts;
SELECT account_holder_name, property_address FROM Escrow_Accounts WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EscrowServices;
SELECT property_address, buyer_name, seller_name FROM EscrowServices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT escrow_amount FROM EscrowServices WHERE seller_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM Employees WHERE emp_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM EscrowServices ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_address, escrow_amount FROM EscrowServices WHERE escrow_amount > 5000 ORDER BY escrow_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name FROM EscrowServices WHERE buyer_name='John Doe' OR seller_name='Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM Transactions JOIN EscrowServices ON Transactions.escrow_id = EscrowServices.id WHERE Transactions.amount > 10000 ORDER BY Transactions.amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender, receiver, timestamp FROM Messages WHERE receiver='Alice' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
